content.p:
* ยง 4202. Regulations for admission. The commissioner may make such
regulations and give such directions to parents and persons in parental
relation, in relation to the admission of students into any institution
specified in this article, as will prevent students entering the same at
irregular periods. Such regulations shall include, but not be limited
to, procedures to assure that the due process rights of students and
their parents or persons in parental relation are protected in
accordance with sections forty-four hundred two, forty-four hundred four
and forty-four hundred four-a of this title and applicable federal law
and regulations.
 * NB Effective until June 30, 2027
 * ยง 4202. Regulations for admission. The commissioner of education may
make such regulations and give such directions to parents and guardians,
in relation to the admission of pupils into any institution specified in
this article, as will prevent pupils entering the same at irregular
periods.
 * NB Effective June 30, 2027
